pr_title: Misc fixes for cosmos public surface APIs

timeline.message: Misc fixes for cosmos public surface APIs

timeline.bodyText: maybe we should mention that these may change in future.
timeline.author: moderakh
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -55,257 +51,220 @@
  * This is meant to be used only internally as a bridge access to classes in
  * com.azure.cosmos
  **/
+@Warning(value = "Internal use only, not meant for public usage")

timeline.bodyText: you might be able to define a static final warning String message as string and reuse, rather than repeating the warning on each method.
timeline.author: moderakh
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -55,257 +51,220 @@
  * This is meant to be used only internally as a bridge access to classes in
  * com.azure.cosmos
  **/
+@Warning(value = "Internal use only, not meant for public usage")

replies.bodyText: Good point, will do that for sure.
replies.author: kushagraThapar

timeline.message: Added constant for warning annotation message
